snippet.textDisplay: such a good OST. It's interesting how polarizing CC as a game is/was. many vocal fans of CT seems to loathe it but I really loved CC right away, and I'm a huge CT fan (played it when it came out in 1995). It has a very dream-like quality to it. The plot is a convoluted spin-off of CT but the basic premise of CC is very universal: what if you made a different decision 10 years ago? what if you ceased to exist? how would things have turned out differently (for everyone)?
snippet.textOriginal: such a good OST. It's interesting how polarizing CC as a game is/was. many vocal fans of CT seems to loathe it but I really loved CC right away, and I'm a huge CT fan (played it when it came out in 1995). It has a very dream-like quality to it. The plot is a convoluted spin-off of CT but the basic premise of CC is very universal: what if you made a different decision 10 years ago? what if you ceased to exist? how would things have turned out differently (for everyone)?

snippet.textDisplay: You're not alone in that world, sir.
snippet.textOriginal: You're not alone in that world, sir.

snippet.textDisplay: You understand exactly why video game music in general appeals to me. Many others have laughed about my tastes over the years, but I don't think anything strange of it. The right soundtrack can transport you to a new world. Listening to this, I feel like I am in the world of Chrono Cross, and I remember the good times I've had playing it nonstop. I love feeling like I'm a part of such a magical world.
snippet.textOriginal: You understand exactly why video game music in general appeals to me. Many others have laughed about my tastes over the years, but I don't think anything strange of it. The right soundtrack can transport you to a new world. Listening to this, I feel like I am in the world of Chrono Cross, and I remember the good times I've had playing it nonstop. I love feeling like I'm a part of such a magical world.

snippet.textDisplay:
I find it amazing that I haven't played this game, much less heard this song in about 10 years.. yet the moment I hear it again, I'm able to whistle along with it perfectly, as though I heard it playing just the other day.

That's how you know a piece of music is good.

snippet.textDisplay:
It's good, don't get me wrong. My 5/5 tracks, off the cuff:

Time's Scar
Beach of Dreams
Reminiscing
Lost Fragments
Prisoners of Fate
Garden of the Gods
Radical Dreamers - Unstolen Jewel

There may be others, but those i know were keepers for sure.
snippet.textOriginal:
It's good, don't get me wrong. My 5/5 tracks, off the cuff:

Time's Scar
Beach of Dreams
Reminiscing
Lost Fragments
Prisoners of Fate
Garden of the Gods
Radical Dreamers - Unstolen Jewel

There may be others, but those i know were keepers for sure.

snippet.textDisplay:

CC has one of the most brilliant, expressive tracks ever.
snippet.textOriginal:
